import React, { Component } from 'react' import api from '../../api' class Register extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { pseudo: '', password: '' } } handleChangeInputPseudo = async (event) => { const pseudo = event.target.value this.setState({ pseudo }) } handleChangeInputPassword = async (event) => { const password = event.target.value this.setState({ password }) } handleLoginUser = async () => { const { pseudo, password } = this.state } render() { const { pseudo, password } = this.state return (
